reapack.desc: Razor Edit Control Functions

version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + general cleanup, excessive comments in code + an attempt to use MIDI_Sort properly + RE movement: added undo points + MIDI edits: added "select last hit notes in RE" + MIDI edits: if no REs exist, enclose selected items in RE then run edit + MIDI edits: nudge last-hit note in RE

version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + RE dimension functions are now up to date + changed child scripts from deferred to one-offs (duh) + moved (get mouse note, item, take, position) info to dedicated function + updated RazorEditSelectionExists(1) to select item under mouse if no item is selected + mute: if no RE, mute item under mouse cursor instead

version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + fixes to RazorEditSelectionExists(make) to prevent error when no item is present

version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + fixed add fx by js filename

version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + fixed MIDI scripts trying to work on audio items and creating unwanted REs +
